pageTitle: Synopsis - Oracle Solaris Cluster Reference Manual
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {30514=To specify a tagged-VLAN adapter, use the tagged-VLAN adapter name that is derived from the physical device name and the VLAN instance number. The VLAN instance number is the VLAN ID multiplied by 1000 plus the original physical-unit number. For example, a VLAN ID of 11 on the physical device bge2 translates to the tagged-VLAN adapter name bge11002.}
textBeforeTable: See attributes(5) for descriptions of the following attributes: Attributes # clnode show phys-schost-1 The following command displays configuration information about phys-schost-1 in a cluster. Example 11 Displaying Configuration Information About a Particular Node in a Cluster Transport Adapter List: bge2, bge3 # clnode show The following command displays configuration information about all nodes in a cluster. Example 10 Displaying Configuration Information About All Nodes in a Cluster cz2:phys-schost-3 Offline # clnode status -Z all The following command displays the status of all global-cluster nodes and zone-cluster nodes in a cluster. Example 9 Displaying the Status of All Global-Cluster Nodes and Zone-Cluster Nodes in a Cluster cpu_load unlimited/unlimited 0 OK Transport Adapter List: bge2, bge3 quorum_resv_key: 0x4487349A00000001 quorum_defaultvote: 1 quorum_vote: 1 defaultpsetmin: 1 globalzoneshares: 1 reboot_on_path_failure: disabled privatehostname: clusternode1-priv Enabled: yes Node ID: 1 Node Name: phys-schost-1 === Cluster Nodes === quorum_resv_key: 0x4487349A00000002 quorum_defaultvote: 1 quorum_vote: 1 defaultpsetmin: 1 globalzoneshares: 1 reboot_on_path_failure: disabled privatehostname: clusternode2-priv Enabled: yes Node ID: 2 Node Name: phys-schost-2 Transport Adapter List: bge2, bge3 quorum_resv_key: 0x4487349A00000001 quorum_defaultvote: 1 quorum_vote: 1 defaultpsetmin: 1 globalzoneshares: 1 reboot_on_path_failure: disabled privatehostname: clusternode1-priv Enabled: yes Node ID: 1 Node Name: phys-schost-1 === Cluster Nodes === cz2:phys-schost-1 Online --------- ------ Node Name Status --- Node Status --- === Zone Cluster Nodes === global:phys-schost-3 Online global:phys-schost-4 Online global:phys-schost-2 Online global:phys-schost-1 Online --------- ------ Node Name Status --- Node Status --- === Cluster Nodes === phys-schost-2 disk_load 90/97 11 OK cpu_load 2/unlimited 1 OK disk_load 10/15 14
